Ben Levy is a Managing Director and a member of the Healthcare team at Berkshire Partners. He is currently involved with Berkshire portfolio companies.
Ben Levy is a cognitive neuroscientist who received his PhD from the University of Oregon. His research focuses on memory and cognitive control.
